commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceNew: /** * Resets the scanner to read from a new input stream. * Does not close the old reader. * * All internal variables are reset, the old input stream * cannot be reused (internal buffer is discarded and lost). * Lexical state is set to ZZ_INITIAL. * * @param reader the new input stream */ void yyreset(Reader reader);
commits.sourceOld: /** * Resets the scanner to read from a new input stream. * Does not close the old reader. * * All internal variables are reset, the old input stream * cannot be reused (internal buffer is discarded and lost). * Lexical state is set to ZZ_INITIAL. * * @param reader the new input stream */ void reset(Reader reader);
